item.title: Expert Tips for Writing a Powerful Resume
item.category: "resume writing" , "resume tips" , "font usage" , "resume structure" , "resume types" , "chronological resume" , "functional resume" , "combination resume" , "keyword optimization" , "references on resume" , "resume statement" , "handling layoffs" , "handling gaps in resume" , "graduation year on resume" , "listing certifications" , "resume layout" , "concise resume" , "white space in resume" , "resume customization" , "professional resume"
item.description: Learn the best practices for creating an effective resume, including font usage, resume types, keyword optimization, handling gaps, and optimizing layout.
